text: haey chaur puok anak romluk nouv nie k meat robsa a l laoh del trong ban bratan aoy puok anak ning kechchasanyea del trong ban sanyea vea champoh puok anak ku nowpel del puok anak ban niyeay tha puok yeung banlyy haey prom brate b tde tam . chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha doeng nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd
